items.value: Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City

en.text:
Hi there! My name is Trinh, I'm a **QA/QC professional** with extensive experience in **manual testing**, specializing in ensuring the highest standards of **software quality** and **performance**.

My expertise includes **designing and executing comprehensive test plans**, identifying **critical defects**, and collaborating with **cross-functional teams** to deliver robust, user-focused solutions.

I have a strong foundation in various **testing methodologies**, such as **functional**, **regression**, and **user acceptance testing (UAT)**, and a keen eye for detail that helps uncover issues early in the development cycle.

Passionate about **continuous improvement**, I stay updated with **industry best practices** and **emerging tools** to enhance testing efficiency.

My goal is to contribute to **seamless, high-quality product releases** while maintaining a **user-centric approach** to **quality assurance**.

I look forward to collaborating **with you!**

es.text:
Soy un desarrollador de PHP con más de una década de experiencia, especializado en desarrollo backend y con algo de experiencia en frontend. También tengo experiencia práctica en entornos de producción con C++, C#, Go y Python.

Este variado historial me permite adaptarme a una amplia gama de necesidades de proyectos.

¡Espero con interés colaborar contigo!

fr.text:
Je suis développeur PHP avec plus d'une décennie d'expérience, spécialisé dans le développement backend avec un peu de travail en frontend également. J'ai aussi de l'expérience en production avec les technologies C++, C#, Go et Python.

Ce parcours diversifié me permet de m'adapter à une large gamme de besoins de projets.

Je suis impatient de collaborer avec vous !

ko.text:
저는 백엔드 개발을 전문으로 하고, 프론트엔드 작업도 일부 수행해온 10년 이상의 경력을 가진 PHP 개발자입니다. 또한 C++, C#, Go, Python 스택을 사용한 프로덕션 경험도 있습니다.

이 다양한 배경 덕분에 프로젝트의 다양한 요구에 유연하게 대처할 수 있습니다.

당신과 협업하기를 기대하고 있습니다!
